column5: Located at Lake Conroe near Houston, Texas, this 2 bedroom resort condo is available for rent for 3 nights   Fully furnished 2 Queen size beds and one sleeper sofa 2 bathrooms Full kitchen with stove, dishes, dishwasher, pots and pans Sleeps 6 adult guests comfortably Non-Smoking Room Paddle boat rentals on-site at the lake  45 min from IAH Bush Airport 1 hour from Reliant Stadium
column8: Apartment at Lake Conroe near Houston
